mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(measure_num), 0) FROM drilling_stress WHERE tag = '1' AND mine_id = #{mineId} AND del_flag = '0' ORDER BY SUBSTRING(measure_num, -4) DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT measure_num FROM drilling_stress as ds
ds.mine_id = #{mineId} AND ds.del_flag = '0'
AND ds.survey_area_name like concat('%',#{surveyAreaName},'%')

SELECT ds.drilling_stress_id AS dataId, ds.measure_num AS measureNum, ds.workface_id AS workFaceId, ds.sensor_location AS sensorLocation, ds.sensor_type AS sensorType FROM drilling_stress ds
ds.mine_id = #{mineId} AND ds.del_flag = '0'
AND ( ds.sensor_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR ds.workface_id IN ( SELECT bw.workface_id FROM biz_workface bw WHERE bw.workface_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND bw.del_flag = '0' AND bw.mine_id = #{mineId} ) )
GROUP BY ds.install_time DESC
